function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliability of electrical infrastructure supporting ICU ventilators and equipment","Impact":"Risk of equipment failure during critical care","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of electrical systems","Technologies":"Smart grid technology for energy management","People":"ICU patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Inadequate medical gas supply network","Impact":"Inability to provide essential medical gases to patients","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of gas supply systems","Technologies":"Automated gas monitoring and control systems","People":"ICU patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Biomedical engineering team"},{"Description":"Risk of contagion due to inadequate video and audio surveillance","Impact":"Increased risk of viral spread through insufficient monitoring","Mitigation":"Deployment of advanced video and audio surveillance systems","Technologies":"AI-based surveillance technologies","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, visitors","Owner":"Facility management team"}]}
